snippet.title: Escape Tales: The Awakening - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Escape Tales: The Awakening is a digital adaptation of the bestselling escape room card game by LockMe and Board&Dice. The game is coming to Steam in late 2024.

In this gripping escape room adventure, players step into the shoes of Sam, a man devastated by the death of his wife and the mysterious coma that has befallen his daughter. With medical explanations failing and a friend's "accidental" gift of "The Book of Rituals," Sam embarks on a perilous journey to save his daughter, confronting unknown forces along the way.

The game offers a rich, immersive experience filled with mystery and darkness, weaving a tale of loss, redemption, and the shadows of the past. Key features include open exploration, multiple endings, challenging puzzles, and an engaging narrative. Players' moral decisions and problem-solving skills will be tested, but they can take their time, thanks to the game's non-timed, replayable nature.

Escape Tales: The Awakening will be available on Steam later this year. In the meantime, you can add it to your wishlist to stay updated on its release! Follow Bluekey Games on social media for the latest updates on Escape Tales: The Awakening!
